name: More Yellow
description:
MoreYellow is a Digital Campaign Agency. We combine advertising tactics with digital product building to tell your story. We do this by building and bringing products to market through online channels.
Services: 
Strategy & Planning: Campaign Concepts & Strategy, Competitor Analysis, Consumer Insights, Acquisition & Retention Planning. 
Content Creation: Responsive Websites, Web Applications, Social Competitions, Casual Games, Online Ads, Newsletter Campaigns. 
Launch & Engagement: Targeted Social Buys, Influencer Integration Programs, Co-Promotion Sponsorships, Social Account Management, Social Media Advertising & Management. 
Insights & Optimizations: Site, Social & Channel Analytic Reviews, Performance Analysis, Conversion Tracking, Optimization & Maintenance.
READ MORE...
